room.name: The Galley
room.description: This is the kitchen of the ship. It is located on the east side.
room.item: Use this item to cut a bitch.

room.name: The Deck
room.description: Hang out with your pirate pals on the deck.
room.item: It's missing a leg, just like Captain Buttocks.
Use this to spy on Captain Buttocks.

room.name: Captain's quarters
room.description: This is where the captain sleeps.
room.item: Use this to comb to rip out your hair.
It's a can of pepper spray - aim for the eyes.

room.name: Sick Room
room.description: This is where all the sick people die.
room.item: It's very bitter. Take some if you want to forget your pain.

room.name: Bridge
room.description: This is where the captain and officers work.
room.item: Tie some fancy knots with this.

room.name: Boiler Room
room.description: This is where water is boiled. It's hot and steamy.
room.item: Find your worst enemy and knock them out.
